global.hero_sub: The master controller for decentralized education logistics.

grid.title: Logistics
grid.desc: Permits, visas, and administrative drag. We handle the friction so you can work.

grid.title: Network
grid.desc: Connections that are actually useful. No networking events. Just the contacts you need.

grid.title: Funding
grid.desc: Capital for action, not promises. Funds move in days, not months.

tracks.title: LAB
tracks.desc: Small cycles. Field conditions. A student team runs a build → test sequence with a partner site.

tracks.title: STUDIO
tracks.desc: Local forms. Real practice. Students join a host studio, rehearse a short piece, and deliver a clean showing.

tracks.title: PANEL
tracks.desc: Nodes. Systems. Coordination. An educator links with a local institution and sets a shared route.

method.title: Input
method.desc: You define the project parameters. We provide the framework.

method.title: Integration
method.desc: Your curriculum plugs into our network. Logistics, funding, and access aligned.

method.title: Deployment
method.desc: Field execution. Real stakes. Students and educators gain hands-on experience.
